contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document describes the interface to the Telnet server on IBM's iSeries line of midrange business computers. This interface allows Telnet clients to request a Telnet terminal or printer session using specific session attributes related to device names, encryption, language support, auto-sign-on, response codes, session association, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述了与IBM iSeries系列中端业务计算机上的Telnet服务器的接口。此接口允许Telnet客户端使用与设备名称、加密、语言支持、自动登录、响应代码、会话关联等相关的特定会话属性请求Telnet终端或打印机会话。

contents.text: These support functions are implemented primarily using the Telnet Environment option negotiation RFC 1572 to define new USERVAR variables that will be recognized by iSeries Telnet server.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些支持功能主要使用Telnet环境选项协商RFC 1572来实现，以定义iSeries Telnet服务器将识别的新用户变量。

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: The iSeries Telnet server enables clients to negotiate both terminal and printer device names through Telnet Environment Options Negotiations [RFC1572].
contents.zh-CHS: iSeries Telnet服务器使客户端能够通过Telnet环境选项协商来协商终端和打印机设备名称[RFC1572]。

contents.text: This allows Telnet servers and clients to exchange environment information using a set of standard or custom variables. By using a combination of both standard VARs and custom USERVARs, the iSeries Telnet server allows client Telnet to request a pre-defined specific device by name.
contents.zh-CHS: 这允许Telnet服务器和客户端使用一组标准或自定义变量交换环境信息。通过结合使用标准变量和自定义用户变量，iSeries Telnet服务器允许客户端Telnet按名称请求预定义的特定设备。

contents.text: If no pre-defined device exists, then the device will be created, with client Telnet having the option to negotiate device attributes, such as the code page, character set, keyboard type, etc.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果不存在预定义的设备，则将创建该设备，客户端Telnet可以选择协商设备属性，如代码页、字符集、键盘类型等。

contents.text: Since printers can now be negotiated as a device name, new terminal types have been defined to request printers. For example, you can
contents.zh-CHS: 由于现在可以将打印机协商为设备名称，因此定义了新的终端类型以请求打印机。例如，你可以

contents.text: now negotiate "IBM-3812-1" and "IBM-5553-B01" as valid TERMINAL-TYPE options [RFC1091].
contents.zh-CHS: 现在协商“IBM-3812-1”和“IBM-5553-B01”作为有效的终端类型选项[RFC1091]。

contents.text: Finally, the iSeries Telnet server will allow exchange of user profile and password information, where the password may be in either plain text or encrypted form. If a valid combination of profile and password is received, then the client is allowed to bypass the sign-on panel. The local server setting of the QRMTSIGN system value must be either *VERIFY or *SAMEPRF for the bypass of the sign-on panel to succeed.
contents.zh-CHS: 最后，iSeries Telnet服务器将允许用户配置文件和密码信息的交换，其中密码可以是纯文本或加密形式。如果收到配置文件和密码的有效组合，则允许客户端绕过登录面板。QRMTSIGN系统值的本地服务器设置必须为*VERIFY或*SAMEPRF，才能成功绕过登录面板。

contents.text: 2. Standard Telnet Option Negotiation
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 标准Telnet选项协商

contents.text: Telnet server option negotiation [RFC855] typically begins with the issuance, by the server, of an invitation to engage in terminal type negotiation with the Telnet client (DO TERMINAL-TYPE) [RFC1091]. The client and server then enter into a series of sub-negotiations to determine the level of terminal support that will be used. After the terminal type is agreed upon, the client and server will normally negotiate a required set of additional options (EOR [RFC885], BINARY [RFC856], SGA [RFC858]) that are required to support "transparent mode" or full screen 5250/3270 block mode support. As soon as the required options have been negotiated, the server will suspend further negotiations and begin with initializing the actual virtual device on the iSeries. A typical exchange might start as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: Telnet服务器选项协商[RFC855]通常从服务器发出邀请开始，邀请与Telnet客户端进行终端类型协商（DO terminal-type）[RFC1091]。然后，客户机和服务器进入一系列子协商，以确定将使用的终端支持级别。在商定终端类型后，客户机和服务器通常会协商一组所需的附加选项（EOR[RFC885]、二进制[RFC856]、SGA[RFC858]），这些选项是支持“透明模式”或全屏5250/3270块模式所需的。一旦协商了所需的选项，服务器将暂停进一步协商，并开始初始化iSeries上的实际虚拟设备。典型的交换可能如下所示开始：

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server             Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------        -------------------------
IAC DO TERMINAL-TYPE        -->
                            <--   IAC WILL TERMINAL-TYPE
IAC SB TERMINAL-TYPE SEND
IAC SE                      -->
                                  IAC SB TERMINAL-TYPE IS
                            <--   IBM-5555-C01 IAC SE
IAC DO EOR                  -->
                            <--   IAC WILL EOR
                            <--   IAC DO EOR
IAC WILL EOR                -->
                             .
                             .
(other negotiations)         .
Actual bytes transmitted in the above example are shown in hex below.
contents.zh-CHS: 在上述示例中传输的实际字节以十六进制表示。

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server             Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------        -------------------------
FF FD 18                    -->
                            <--   FF FB 18
FF FA 18 01 FF F0           -->
                                  FF FA 18 00 49 42 4D 2D
                                  35 35 35 35 2D 43 30 31
                            <--   FF F0
FF FD 19                    -->
                            <--   FF FB 19
                            <--   FF FD 19
FF FB 19                    -->
                             .
                             .
(other negotiations)         .

Some negotiations are symmetrical between client and server, and some are negotiated in one direction only. Also, it is permissible and common practice to bundle more than one response or request, or to combine a request with a response, so in practice the actual exchange may look different from what is shown above.
contents.zh-CHS: 有些协商在客户端和服务器之间是对称的，有些协商只在一个方向上进行。另外，捆绑多个响应或请求，或者将一个请求与一个响应结合起来，这是允许的，也是常见的做法，因此在实践中，实际的交换可能与上面所示的不同。

contents.text: 3. Enhanced Telnet Option Negotiation
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 增强的Telnet选项协商

contents.text: In order to accommodate the new environment option negotiations, the server will bundle an environment option invitation along with the standard terminal type invitation request to the client.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了适应新的环境选项协商，服务器将把环境选项邀请与标准终端类型邀请请求捆绑到客户端。

contents.text: A client should either send a negative acknowledgment (WONT NEW-ENVIRON), or at some point after completing terminal-type negotiations, but before completing the full set of negotiations required for 5250 transparent mode, engage in environment option sub-negotiation with the server. A maximum of 1024 bytes of environment strings may be sent to the server. A recommended sequence might look like the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端应发送否定确认（不会是NEW-ENVIRON），或在完成终端类型协商后的某个时间点，但在完成5250透明模式所需的整套协商之前，与服务器进行环境选项子协商。最多可向服务器发送1024字节的环境字符串。建议的顺序可能如下所示：

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server             Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------        -------------------------
IAC DO NEW-ENVIRON
IAC DO TERMINAL-TYPE        -->
(2 requests bundled)
                            <--   IAC WILL NEW-ENVIRON
IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND
VAR IAC SE                  -->
                                  IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS
                                  VAR "USER" VALUE "JONES"
                                  USERVAR "DEVNAME"
                                  VALUE "MYDEVICE07"
                            <--   IAC SE
                            <--   IAC WILL TERMINAL-TYPE
                                  (do the terminal type
                                  sequence first)
IAC SB TERMINAL-TYPE SEND
IAC SE                      -->
                                  IAC SB TERMINAL-TYPE IS
                            <--   IBM-5555-C01 IAC SE
                                  (terminal type negotiations
                                  completed)
IAC DO EOR                  -->
(server will continue
with normal transparent
mode negotiations)
                            <--   IAC WILL EOR
                             .
                             .
(other negotiations)         .
Actual bytes transmitted in the above example are shown in hex below.
contents.zh-CHS: 在上述示例中传输的实际字节以十六进制表示。

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server             Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------        -------------------------
FF FD 27
FF FD 18                    -->
(2 requests bundled)
                            <--   FF FB 27
FF FA 27 01 00 FF F0        -->
                                  FF FA 27 00 00 55 53 45
                                  52 01 4A 4F 4E 45 53 03
                                  44 45 56 4E 41 4D 45 01
                                  4D 59 44 45 56 49 43 45
                            <--   30 37 FF F0
                            <--   FF FB 18
                                  (do the terminal type
                                  sequence first)
FF FA 18 01 FF F0           -->
                                  FF FA 18 00 49 42 4D 2D
                                  35 35 35 35 2D 43 30 31
                            <--   FF F0
FF FD 19                    -->
(server will continue
with normal transparent
mode negotiations)
                            <--   FF FB 19
                             .
                             .
(other negotiations)         .

Telnet environment options defines 6 standard VARs: USER, JOB, ACCT, PRINTER, SYSTEMTYPE, and DISPLAY. The USER standard VAR will hold the value of the iSeries user profile name to be used in auto-sign-on requests. The Telnet server will make no direct use of the additional 5 VARs, nor are any of them required to be sent. All standard VARs and their values that are received by the Telnet server will be placed in a buffer, along with any USERVARs received (described below), and made available to a registered initialization exit program to be used for any purpose desired.
contents.zh-CHS: Telnet环境选项定义了6个标准变量：用户、作业、帐户、打印机、系统类型和显示。用户标准变量将保存自动登录请求中使用的iSeries用户配置文件名称的值。Telnet服务器不会直接使用额外的5个VAR，也不需要发送任何VAR。Telnet服务器接收到的所有标准VAR及其值将与接收到的任何USERVAR（如下所述）一起放置在缓冲区中，并可供注册的初始化退出程序用于任何预期目的。

contents.text: There are some reasons you may want to send NEW-ENVIRON negotiations prior to TERMINAL-TYPE negotiations. With an iSeries Telnet server, several virtual device modes can be negotiated: 1) VTxxx device, 2) 3270 device, and 3) 5250 device (includes Network Station). The virtual device mode selected depends on the TERMINAL-TYPE negotiated plus any other Telnet option negotiations necessary to support those modes. The iSeries Telnet server will create the desired virtual device at the first opportunity it thinks it has all the requested
contents.zh-CHS: 在终端类型协商之前，您可能希望发送新环境协商，这有一些原因。使用iSeries Telnet服务器，可以协商几种虚拟设备模式：1）VTxxx设备、2）3270设备和3）5250设备（包括网络站）。选择的虚拟设备模式取决于协商的终端类型以及支持这些模式所需的任何其他Telnet选项协商。iSeries Telnet服务器将在其认为拥有所有请求的资源的第一时间创建所需的虚拟设备

contents.text: attributes needed to create the device. This can be as early as completion of the TERMINAL-TYPE negotiations.
contents.zh-CHS: 创建设备所需的属性。这可以尽早完成终端式谈判。

contents.text: For the case of Transparent mode (5250 device), the moment TERMINAL-TYPE, BINARY, and EOR options are negotiated, the Telnet server will go create the virtual device. Receiving any NEW-ENVIRON negotiations after these option negotiations are complete will result in the NEW-ENVIRON negotiations having no effect on device attributes, as the virtual device will have already been created.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于透明模式（5250设备），一旦协商终端类型、二进制和EOR选项，Telnet服务器将创建虚拟设备。在这些选项协商完成后接收任何新环境协商将导致新环境协商对设备属性没有影响，因为虚拟设备已经创建。

contents.text: So, for Transparent mode, NEW-ENVIRON negotiations are effectively closed once EOR is negotiated, since EOR is generally the last option done.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，对于透明模式，一旦协商EOR，新环境谈判将有效结束，因为EOR通常是最后一个选择。

contents.text: For other devices modes (such as VTxxx or 3270), you cannot be sure when the iSeries Telnet server thinks it has all the attributes to create the device. Recall that NEW-ENVIRON negotiations are optional, and therefore the iSeries Telnet server need not wait for any NEW-ENVIRON options prior to creating the virtual device. It is in the clients' best interest to send NEW-ENVIRON negotiations as soon as possible, preferably before TERMINAL-TYPE is negotiated. That way, the client can be sure that the requested attributes were received before the virtual device is created.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于其他设备模式（如VTxxx或3270），您无法确定iSeries Telnet服务器何时认为它具有创建设备的所有属性。回想一下，NEW-ENVIRON协商是可选的，因此iSeries Telnet服务器在创建虚拟设备之前无需等待任何NEW-ENVIRON选项。客户的最大利益是尽快发送NEW-ENVIRON谈判，最好在终端类型谈判之前发送。这样，客户机可以确保在创建虚拟设备之前收到请求的属性。

contents.text: 4. Enhanced Display Emulation Support
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 增强的显示仿真支持

contents.text: Telnet environment option USERVARs have been defined to allow a compliant Telnet client more control over the Telnet server virtual device on the iSeries and to provide information to the Telnet server about the client. These USERVARs allow the client Telnet to create or select a previously created virtual device. If the virtual device does not exist and must be created, then the USERVAR variables are used to create and initialize the device attributes. If the virtual device already exists, the device attributes are modified.
contents.zh-CHS: Telnet环境选项USERVARs已定义为允许兼容的Telnet客户端对iSeries上的Telnet服务器虚拟设备进行更多控制，并向Telnet服务器提供有关客户端的信息。这些用户变量允许客户端Telnet创建或选择以前创建的虚拟设备。如果虚拟设备不存在且必须创建，则使用USERVAR变量创建和初始化设备属性。如果虚拟设备已存在，则修改设备属性。

contents.text: The USERVARs defined to accomplish this are:
contents.zh-CHS: 为实现这一点而定义的用户变量包括：

contents.text:
USERVAR        VALUE              EXAMPLE         DESCRIPTION
--------       ----------------   --------------  -------------------
DEVNAME        us-ascii char(x)   MYDEVICE07      Display device name
KBDTYPE        us-ascii char(3)   USB             Keyboard type
CODEPAGE       us-ascii char(y)   437             Code page
CHARSET        us-ascii char(y)   1212            Character set
IBMSENDCONFREC us-ascii char(3)   YES | NO        Startup Response
                                                    Record desired
IBMASSOCPRT    us_ascii char(x)   RFCPRT          Printer associated
                                                    with display
                                                    device
x - up to a maximum of 10 characters y - up to a maximum of 5 characters
contents.zh-CHS: x-最多10个字符y-最多5个字符

contents.text: For a description of the KBDTYPE, CODEPAGE, and CHARSET parameters and their permissible values, refer to Chapter 8 in the Communications Configuration Reference [COMM-CONFIG] and also to Appendix C in National Language Support [NLS-SUPPORT].
contents.zh-CHS: 有关KBDTYPE、CODEPAGE和CHARSET参数及其允许值的说明，请参阅通信配置参考[COMM-CONFIG]中的第8章以及国家语言支持[NLS-Support]中的附录C。

contents.text: The CODEPAGE and CHARSET USERVARs must be associated with a KBDTYPE USERVAR. If either CODEPAGE or CHARSET are sent without KBDTYPE, they will default to system values. A default value for KBDTYPE can be sent to force CODEPAGE and CHARSET values to be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 代码页和字符集用户变量必须与KBDTYPE用户变量相关联。如果发送的代码页或字符集没有KBDTYPE，它们将默认为系统值。可以发送KBDTYPE的默认值以强制使用代码页和字符集值。

contents.text: iSeries system objects such as device names, user profiles, plain text passwords, programs, libraries, etc., are required to be specified in English uppercase. This includes:
contents.zh-CHS: iSeries系统对象，如设备名称、用户配置文件、纯文本密码、程序、库等，需要以英文大写形式指定。这包括：

contents.text: any letter (A-Z), any number (0-9), special characters (# $ _ @)
contents.zh-CHS: 任意字母（A-Z）、任意数字（0-9）、特殊字符（#$@）

contents.text: Therefore, where us-ascii is specified for VAR or USERVAR values, it is recommended that uppercase ASCII values be sent, which will be converted to Extended Binary Coded Decimal Interchange Code (EBCDIC) by the Telnet server.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，如果为VAR或USERVAR值指定us ascii，建议发送大写ascii值，Telnet服务器将其转换为扩展二进制编码十进制交换码（EBCDIC）。

contents.text: A special case occurs for encrypted passwords (described in the next section), where both the initial password and user profile used to build the encrypted password must be EBCDIC English uppercase, in order to be properly authenticated by the Telnet server.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密密码有一种特殊情况（将在下一节中介绍），其中用于生成加密密码的初始密码和用户配置文件必须为EBCDIC英语大写，以便Telnet服务器正确验证。

contents.text: The IBMASSOCPRT USERVAR is used to provide the device name of a printer that will be associated with the display device that is created. The device description of the printer name provided must currently exist on the Telnet server system. The IBMSENDCONFREC USERVAR is used by the enhanced Telnet client to inform the Telnet
contents.zh-CHS: IBMASSOCPRT USERVAR用于提供将与所创建的显示设备关联的打印机的设备名称。提供的打印机名称的设备说明当前必须存在于Telnet服务器系统上。增强型Telnet客户端使用IBMSENDCONFREC用户变量通知Telnet

contents.text: server that a display Startup Response Record should be sent to the client. This record communicates the name of the actual display device acquired. If the attempt is unsuccessful, the reason code will be set to provide additional information on why the attempt failed. In addition to the device name and reason code, the Startup Response Record will contain the name of the Telnet server system.
contents.zh-CHS: 显示启动响应记录应发送到客户端的服务器。此记录传达所获取的实际显示设备的名称。如果尝试失败，将设置原因代码以提供有关尝试失败原因的其他信息。除了设备名称和原因代码外，启动响应记录还将包含Telnet服务器系统的名称。

contents.text: For more details on the Startup Response Record, see Section 11 of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关启动响应记录的更多详细信息，请参阅本文档第11节。

contents.text: 5. Enhanced Display Auto-Sign-On and Password Encryption
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 增强的显示自动登录和密码加密

contents.text: To allow password encryption, new IBMRSEED and IBMSUBSPW USERVARs will be used to exchange seed and substitute passwords information. IBMRSEED will carry a random seed to be used in both the Data Encryption Standard (DES) and Secure Hash Algorithm (SHA) password encryption, and IBMSUBSPW will carry the encrypted copy of the password.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了允许密码加密，将使用新的IBMRSEED和IBMSUBSPW用户变量交换seed和替代密码信息。IBMRSEED将携带一个随机种子，用于数据加密标准（DES）和安全哈希算法（SHA）密码加密，IBMSUBSPW将携带密码的加密副本。

contents.text: The DES encryption would use the same 7-step DES-based password substitution scheme as APPC and Client Access. For a description of
contents.zh-CHS: DES加密将使用与APPC和客户端访问相同的7步DES密码替换方案。描述

contents.text: DES encryption, refer to Federal Information Processing Standards Publications (FIPS) 46-2 [FIPS-46-2] and 81 [FIPS-81].
contents.zh-CHS: DES加密，参考联邦信息处理标准出版物（FIPS）46-2[FIPS-46-2]和81[FIPS-81]。

contents.text: The SHA encryption is described in Federal Information Processing Standards Publication 180-1 [FIPS-180-1].
contents.zh-CHS: 联邦信息处理标准出版物180-1[FIPS-180-1]中描述了SHA加密。

contents.text: The FIPS documents can be found at the Federal Information Processing Standards Publications link:
contents.zh-CHS: FIPS文件可在联邦信息处理标准出版物链接中找到：

contents.text: http://www.itl.nist.gov/fipspubs/by-num.htm

If encrypted password exchange is not required, plain text password exchange is permitted using the same USERVARs defined for encryption. For this case, the random client seed should be set either to an empty value (preferred method) or to hexadecimal zeros to indicate the password is not encrypted, but is plain text.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果不需要加密密码交换，则允许使用为加密定义的相同用户变量进行纯文本密码交换。对于这种情况，应将随机客户端种子设置为空值（首选方法）或十六进制零，以指示密码未加密，而是纯文本。

contents.text: It should be noted that security of plain text password exchange cannot be guaranteed unless the network is physically protected or a trusted network (such as an intranet). If your network is vulnerable to IP address spoofing or directly connected to the Internet, you should engage in encrypted password exchange to validate a client's identity.
contents.zh-CHS: 应该注意的是，除非网络受到物理保护或是受信任的网络（如内部网），否则无法保证纯文本密码交换的安全性。如果您的网络容易受到IP地址欺骗或直接连接到Internet的攻击，则应进行加密密码交换以验证客户端的身份。

contents.text: Additional VARs and USERVARs have also been defined to allow an auto-sign-on user greater control over their startup environment,
contents.zh-CHS: 还定义了其他变量和用户变量，以允许自动登录用户更好地控制其启动环境，

contents.text: similar to what is supported using the Open Virtual Terminal (QTVOPNVT) API [SYSTEM-API].
contents.zh-CHS: 类似于使用开放虚拟终端（QTVOPNVT）API[SYSTEM-API]支持的内容。

contents.text: The standard VARs supported to accomplish this are:
contents.zh-CHS: 支持实现这一目标的标准变量有：

contents.text:
VAR        VALUE              EXAMPLE           DESCRIPTION
--------   ----------------   ----------------  -------------------
USER       us-ascii char(x)   USERXYZ           User profile name
x - up to a maximum of 10 characters
contents.zh-CHS: x-最多10个字符

contents.text: The custom USERVARs defined to accomplish this are:
contents.zh-CHS: 为实现此目的而定义的自定义用户变量包括：

contents.text:
USERVAR       VALUE              EXAMPLE            DESCRIPTION
--------      ----------------   ----------------   -----------------
IBMRSEED      binary(8)          8-byte hex field   Random client
                                                      seed
IBMSUBSPW     binary(128)        128-byte hex field Substitute
                                                      password
IBMCURLIB     us-ascii char(x)   QGPL               Current library
IBMIMENU      us-ascii char(x)   MAIN               Initial menu
IBMPROGRAM    us-ascii char(x)   QCMD               Program to call
x - up to a maximum of 10 characters
contents.zh-CHS: x-最多10个字符

contents.text: In order to communicate the server random seed value to the client, the server will request a USERVAR name made up of a fixed part (the 8 characters "IBMRSEED") immediately followed by an 8-byte hexadecimal variable part, which is the server random seed. The client generates its own 8-byte random seed value and uses both seeds to encrypt the password. Both the encrypted password and the client random seed value are then sent to the server for authentication. Telnet environment option rules will need to be adhered to when transmitting the client random seed and substituted password values to the server. Specifically, since a typical environment string is a variable length hexadecimal field, the hexadecimal fields are required to be escaped and/or byte stuffed according to the RFC 854 [RFC854], where any single byte could be misconstrued as a Telnet IAC or other Telnet option negotiation control character. The client must escape and/or byte stuff any bytes that could be seen as a Telnet environment option, specifically VAR, VALUE, ESC, and USERVAR.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了将服务器随机种子值传递给客户端，服务器将请求一个由固定部分（8个字符“IBMRSEED”）组成的USERVAR名称，后跟一个8字节的十六进制变量部分，即服务器随机种子。客户端生成自己的8字节随机种子值，并使用这两个种子对密码进行加密。然后将加密密码和客户端随机种子值发送到服务器进行身份验证。将客户端随机种子和替换密码值传输到服务器时，需要遵守Telnet环境选项规则。具体而言，由于典型的环境字符串是可变长度的十六进制字段，因此十六进制字段需要根据RFC 854[RFC854]进行转义和/或填充字节，其中任何单个字节都可能被误解为Telnet IAC或其他Telnet选项协商控制字符。客户机必须转义和/或字节填充任何可视为Telnet环境选项的字节，特别是VAR、VALUE、ESC和USERVAR。

contents.text: If you use the IBMSENDCONFREC USERVAR, as described in Section 5 of this document, with a value of YES along with the automatic sign-on USERVARs described above, you will receive a Startup Response Record that will contain a response code informing your Telnet client of the success or failure of the automatic sign-on attempt. See Section 11 of this document for details on the Startup Response Record.
contents.zh-CHS: 如本文档第5节所述，如果您使用值为“是”的IBMSENDCONFREC用户变量以及上述自动登录用户变量，您将收到一条启动响应记录，其中包含一个响应代码，通知您的Telnet客户端自动登录尝试的成功或失败。有关启动响应记录的详细信息，请参阅本文件第11节。

contents.text: The following illustrates the encrypted case:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下说明了加密的案例：

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server            Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------       -------------------------------
IAC DO NEW-ENVIRON          -->
                            <--  IAC WILL NEW-ENVIRON
IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND
USERVAR "IBMRSEEDxxxxxxxx"
USERVAR "IBMSUBSPW"
VAR USERVAR IAC SE          -->
                                 IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS
                                 VAR "USER" VALUE "DUMMYUSR"
                                 USERVAR "IBMRSEED" VALUE "yyyyyyyy"
                                 USERVAR "IBMSUBSPW" VALUE "zzzzzzzz"
                            <--  IAC SE
                             .
                             .
(other negotiations)         .

In this example, "xxxxxxxx" is an 8-byte hexadecimal random server seed, "yyyyyyyy" is an 8-byte hexadecimal random client seed, and "zzzzzzzz" is an 8-byte hexadecimal encrypted password (if the DES encryption algorithm was used) or a 20-byte hexadecimal encrypted password (if the SHA encryption algorithm was used). If the password is not valid, then the sign-on panel is not bypassed. If the password is expired, then the sign-on panel is not bypassed.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此示例中，“xxxxxxxx”是一个8字节的十六进制随机服务器种子，“YYYYY”是一个8字节的十六进制随机客户端种子，“ZZZZZZZ”是一个8字节的十六进制加密密码（如果使用DES加密算法）或一个20字节的十六进制加密密码（如果使用SHA加密算法）。如果密码无效，则不会绕过登录面板。如果密码过期，则不会绕过登录面板。

contents.text: Actual bytes transmitted in the above example are shown in hex below, where the server seed is "7D3E488F18080404", the client seed is "4E4142334E414233", and the DES encrypted password is "DFB0402F22ABA3BA". The user profile used to generate the encrypted password is "44554D4D59555352" (DUMMYUSR), with a plain text password of "44554D4D595057" (DUMMYPW).
contents.zh-CHS: 上述示例中传输的实际字节如下所示，其中服务器种子为“7D3E488F18080404”，客户端种子为“4E4142334E414233”，DES加密密码为“DFB0402F22F2ABA3BA”。用于生成加密密码的用户配置文件为“44554D59555352”（DUMMYUSR），纯文本密码为“44554D595057”（DUMMYPW）。

contents.text: The following illustrates the plain text case:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下说明了纯文本情况：

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server            Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------       -------------------------
IAC DO NEW-ENVIRON          -->
                            <--  IAC WILL NEW-ENVIRON
IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND
USERVAR "IBMRSEEDxxxxxxxx"
USERVAR "IBMSUBSPW"
VAR USERVAR IAC SE          -->
                                 IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS
                                 VAR "USER" VALUE "DUMMYUSR"
                                 USERVAR "IBMRSEED" VALUE
                                 USERVAR "IBMSUBSPW" VALUE "yyyyyyyy"
                            <--  IAC SE
                             .
                             .
(other negotiations)         .

In this example, "xxxxxxxx" is an 8-byte hexadecimal random server seed, and "yyyyyyyyyy" is a 128-byte us-ascii client plain text password. If the password has expired, then the sign-on panel is not bypassed.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本例中，“xxxxxxxx”是一个8字节的十六进制随机服务器种子，“YYYYYY”是一个128字节的美国ascii客户端纯文本密码。如果密码已过期，则不会绕过登录面板。

contents.text: Actual bytes transmitted in the above example are shown in hex below, where the server seed is "7D3E488F18080404", the client seed is empty, and the plain text password is "44554D4D595057" (DUMMYPW). The user profile used is "44554D4D59555352" (DUMMYUSR).
contents.zh-CHS: 上述示例中传输的实际字节如下所示，其中服务器种子为“7D3E488F18080404”，客户端种子为空，纯文本密码为“44554D45959507”（DUMMYPW）。使用的用户配置文件是“44554D59555352”（DUMMYUSR）。

contents.text: 5.1. Data Encryption Standard (DES) Password Substitutes
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. 数据加密标准（DES）密码替代品

contents.text: Both APPC and Client Access use well-known DES encryption algorithms to create encrypted passwords. A Network Station or Enhanced Client can generate compatible encrypted passwords if it follows these steps, details of which can be found in the Federal Information Processing Standards 46-2 [FIPS-46-2].
contents.zh-CHS: APPC和客户端访问都使用众所周知的DES加密算法来创建加密密码。如果遵循这些步骤，网络站或增强型客户端可以生成兼容的加密密码，其详细信息可在联邦信息处理标准46-2[FIPS-46-2]中找到。

contents.text: 1) Padded_PW = Left justified user password padded to the right with '40'X to 8 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) Padded_PW=左对齐的用户密码，用“40”X到8字节填充到右侧。

contents.text: The user's password must be left justified in an 8-byte variable and padded to the right with '40'X up to an 8-byte length. If the user's password is 8 bytes in length, no padding will occur. For computing password substitutes for passwords of length 9 and 10, see "Handling passwords of length 9 and 10" below. Passwords less than 1 byte or greater than 10 bytes in length are not valid. Please note that if password is not in EBCDIC, it must be converted to EBCDIC uppercase.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户密码必须在8字节变量中左对齐，并在右侧填充“40”X，最大长度为8字节。如果用户的密码长度为8字节，则不会进行填充。有关计算长度为9和10的密码替代品的信息，请参阅下面的“处理长度为9和10的密码”。长度小于1字节或大于10字节的密码无效。请注意，如果密码不在EBCDIC中，则必须将其转换为EBCDIC大写字母。

contents.text: 2) XOR_PW = Padded_PW xor '5555555555555555'X
contents.zh-CHS: 2) XOR_PW=填充_PW XOR'555555555555'X

contents.text: The padded password is Exclusive OR'ed with 8 bytes of '55'X.
contents.zh-CHS: 填充的密码是独占的或，包含8个字节的'55'X。

contents.text: 3) SHIFT_RESULT = XOR_PW << 1
The entire 8-byte result is shifted 1 bit to the left; the left-most bit value is discarded, and the rightmost bit value is cleared to 0.
contents.zh-CHS: 整个8字节结果向左移位1位；最左边的位值被丢弃，最右边的位值被清除为0。

contents.text:
4) PW_TOKEN = DES_ECB_mode(SHIFT_RESULT,              /* key  */
                           userID_in_EBCDIC_uppercase /* data */ )

This shifted result is used as key to the Data Encryption Standard (Federal Information Processing Standards 46-2 [FIPS-46-2]) to encipher the user identifier. When the user identifier is less than 8 bytes, it is left justified in an 8-byte variable and padded to the right with '40'X. When the user identifier is 9 or 10 bytes, it is first padded to the right with '40'X to a length of 10 bytes. Then bytes 9 and 10 are "folded" into bytes 1-8 using the following algorithm:
contents.zh-CHS: 该移位结果用作数据加密标准（联邦信息处理标准46-2[FIPS-46-2]）的密钥，以加密用户标识符。当用户标识符小于8字节时，将在8字节变量中左对齐，并用“40”X向右填充。当用户标识符为9或10字节时，首先用“40”X向右填充，长度为10字节。然后使用以下算法将字节9和10“折叠”为字节1-8：

contents.text: Bit 0 is the high-order bit (i.e., has value of '80'X).
contents.zh-CHS: 位0是高阶位（即值为'80'X）。

contents.text: Byte 1, bits 0 and 1 are replaced with byte 1, bits 0 and 1 Exclusive OR'ed with byte 9, bits 0 and 1. Byte 2, bits 0 and 1 are replaced with byte 2, bits 0 and 1 Exclusive OR'ed with byte 9, bits 2 and 3. Byte 3, bits 0 and 1 are replaced with byte 3, bits 0 and 1 Exclusive OR'ed with byte 9, bits 4 and 5. Byte 4, bits 0 and 1 are replaced with byte 4, bits 0 and 1 Exclusive OR'ed with byte 9, bits 6 and 7. Byte 5, bits 0 and 1 are replaced with byte 5, bits 0 and 1 Exclusive OR'ed with byte 10, bits 0 and 1. Byte 6, bits 0 and 1 are replaced with byte 6, bits 0 and 1 Exclusive OR'ed with byte 10, bits 2 and 3. Byte 7, bits 0 and 1 are replaced with byte 7, bits 0 and 1 Exclusive OR'ed with byte 10, bits 4 and 5. Byte 8, bits 0 and 1 are replaced with byte 8, bits 0 and 1 Exclusive OR'ed with byte 10, bits 6 and 7.
contents.zh-CHS: 字节1、位0和1替换为字节1，位0和1异或替换为字节9、位0和1。字节2、位0和1替换为字节2，位0和1与字节9、位2和3异或。字节3、位0和1替换为字节3，位0和1与字节9、位4和5异或。字节4、位0和1替换为字节4，位0和1与字节9、位6和7异或。字节5、位0和1替换为字节5，位0和1与字节10、位0和1异或。字节6、位0和1替换为字节6，位0和1与字节10、位2和3异或。字节7、位0和1替换为字节7，位0和1与字节10、位4和5异或。字节8、位0和1替换为字节8，位0和1与字节10、位6和7异或。

contents.text: User identifiers greater than 10 bytes or less than 1 byte are not the result of this encryption ID, known as PW_TOKEN in the paper.
contents.zh-CHS: 大于10字节或小于1字节的用户标识符不是该加密ID（本文中称为PW_令牌）的结果。

contents.text: 5) Increment PWSEQs and store it.
contents.zh-CHS: 5) 增加PWSEQs并存储它。

contents.text: Each LU must maintain a pair of sequence numbers for ATTACHs sent and received on each session. Each time an ATTACH is generated, (and password substitutes are in use on the session) the sending sequence number, PWSEQs, is incremented and saved for the next time. Both values are set to zero at BIND time. So the first use of PWSEQs has the value of 1 and increases by one with each use. A new field is added to the ATTACH to carry this sequence number. However, in certain error conditions, it is possible for the sending side to increment the sequence number, and the receiver may not increment it. When the sender sends a subsequent ATTACH, the receiver will detect a missing sequence. This is allowed. However the sequence number received must always be larger than the previous one, even if some are missing.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个LU必须为每个会话上发送和接收的附件维护一对序列号。每次生成附加时（会话中使用密码替代项），发送序列号PWSEQs将递增并保存，以备下次使用。这两个值在绑定时都设置为零。因此，PWSEQs的首次使用值为1，每次使用增加1。附加中添加了一个新字段以携带此序列号。然而，在某些错误条件下，发送端可能增加序列号，而接收方可能不增加序列号。当发送方发送后续附加时，接收方将检测到丢失的序列。这是允许的。但是，接收到的序列号必须始终大于前一个序列号，即使缺少一些序列号。

contents.text: The maximum number of consecutive missing sequence numbers allowed is 16. If this is exceeded, the session is unbound with a protocol violation.
contents.zh-CHS: 允许的最大连续缺失序号数为16。如果超过此值，会话将因协议冲突而解除绑定。

contents.text: Note: The sequence number must be incremented for every ATTACH sent. However, the sequence number field is only required to be included in the FMH5 if a password substitute is sent (byte 4, bit 3 on).
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：对于发送的每个附加，序列号必须递增。但是，如果发送了密码替换（字节4，第3位开启），则仅要求在FMH5中包含序列号字段。

contents.text: 6) RDrSEQ = RDr + PWSEQs  /* RDr is server seed. */

The current value of PWSEQs is added to RDr, the random value received from the partner LU on this session, yielding RDrSEQ, essentially a predictably modified value of the random value received from the partner LU at BIND time.
contents.zh-CHS: PWSEQs的当前值被添加到RDr中，RDr是在该会话上从伙伴LU接收的随机值，产生RDrSEQ，基本上是绑定时从伙伴LU接收的随机值的可预测修改值。

contents.text:
7) PW_SUB = DES_CBC_mode(PW_TOKEN,        /* key      */
                         (RDrSEQ,         /* 8 bytes  */
                          RDs,            /* 8 bytes  */
                          ID xor RDrSEQ,  /* 16 bytes */
                          PWSEQs,         /* 8 bytes  */
                          )               /* data     */
                         )
The PW_TOKEN is used as a key to the DES function to generate an 8-byte value for the following string of inputs. The DES CBC mode Initialization Vector (IV) used is 8 bytes of '00'X.
contents.zh-CHS: PW_标记用作DES函数的键，为以下输入字符串生成8字节值。使用的DES CBC模式初始化向量（IV）为8字节的'00'X。

contents.text: RDrSEQ: the random data value received from the partner LU plus the sequence number.
contents.zh-CHS: RDrSEQ：从伙伴LU接收的随机数据值加上序列号。

contents.text: RDs: the random data value sent to the partner LU on BIND for this session.
contents.zh-CHS: RDs：此会话绑定时发送给伙伴LU的随机数据值。

contents.text: A 16-byte value created by:
contents.zh-CHS: 由以下内容创建的16字节值：

contents.text: - padding the user identifier with '40'X to a length of 16 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: - 用“40”X填充用户标识符，长度为16字节。

contents.text: - Exclusive OR'ing the two 8-byte halves of the padded user identifier with the RDrSEQ value.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将填充用户标识符的两个8字节部分与RDrSEQ值进行异或运算。

contents.text: Note: User ID must first be converted to EBCDIC uppercase.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：用户ID必须首先转换为EBCDIC大写字母。

contents.text: PWSEQs: the sequence number.
contents.zh-CHS: PWSEQs：序列号。

contents.text: This is similar to the process used on LU-LU verification as described in the Enhanced LU-LU Bind Security. The resulting enciphered random data is the 'password substitute'.
contents.zh-CHS: 这类似于增强的LU-LU绑定安全性中描述的LU-LU验证过程。由此产生的加密随机数据是“密码替代”。

contents.text: 8) Handling passwords of length 9 and 10
contents.zh-CHS: 8) 处理长度为9和10的密码

contents.text: 1. Generate PW_TOKENa by using characters 1 to 8 of the password and steps 1-4 from the previous section.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 使用密码中的字符1到8以及上一节中的步骤1到4生成PW_令牌。

contents.text: 2. Generate PW_TOKENb by using characters 9 and 10 and steps 1-4 from the previous section. In this case, Padded_PW from step 1 will be characters 9 and 10 padded to the right with '40'X, for a total length of 8.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 使用上一节中的字符9和10以及步骤1-4生成PW_令牌B。在这种情况下，第1步中的填充_PW将是字符9和10，在右侧填充“40”X，总长度为8。

contents.text: 3. PW_TOKEN = PW_TOKENa xor PW_TOKENb
contents.zh-CHS: 3. PW_令牌=PW_令牌A异或PW_令牌B

contents.text: 4. Now compute PW_SUB by performing steps 5-7 from the previous section.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 现在通过执行上一节中的步骤5-7计算PW_SUB。

contents.text: 9) Example DES Password Substitute Calculation
contents.zh-CHS: 9) DES密码替换计算示例

contents.text: ID: USER123 Password: ABCDEFG Server seed: '7D4C2319F28004B2'X Client seed: '08BEF662D851F4B1'X PWSEQs: 1 (PWSEQs is a sequence number needed in the 7-step encryption, and it is always one)
contents.zh-CHS: ID:USER123密码：ABCDEFG服务器种子：“7D4C2319F28004B2'X客户端种子：'08BEF662D851F4B1'X PWSEQs:1（PWSEQs是七步加密中需要的序列号，始终为一）

contents.text: DES Encrypted Password should be: '5A58BD50E4DD9B5F'X
contents.zh-CHS: DES加密密码应为：“5A58BD50E4DD9B5F'X

contents.text: 5.2. Secure Hash Algorithm (SHA) Password Substitutes
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 安全哈希算法（SHA）密码替换

contents.text: A Network Station or Enhanced Client can generate SHA encrypted passwords if it follows these steps.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果遵循这些步骤，网络站或增强型客户端可以生成SHA加密的密码。

contents.text: 1) Convert the user identifier to uppercase UNICODE format (if it is not already in this format).
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 将用户标识符转换为大写UNICODE格式（如果尚未使用此格式）。

contents.text: The user identifier must be left justified in a 10-byte variable and padded to the right with '40'X up to a 10-byte length prior to converting it to UNICODE. If the user's password is 10 bytes in length, no padding will occur. User identifiers of less than 1 byte or greater than 10 bytes in length are not valid. The user identifier will be 20 bytes in length after conversion to UNICODE, so the variable that will hold the UNICODE user identifier should have a length of 20 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 在转换为UNICODE之前，用户标识符必须在10字节变量中左对齐，并在右侧填充“40”X，最大长度为10字节。如果用户的密码长度为10字节，则不会进行填充。长度小于1字节或大于10字节的用户标识符无效。转换为UNICODE后，用户标识符的长度为20字节，因此保存UNICODE用户标识符的变量的长度应为20字节。

contents.text: 2) Ensure the password is in UNICODE format (if it is not already in this format).
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 确保密码采用UNICODE格式（如果尚未采用此格式）。

contents.text: The user's password must be left justified in a 128-byte variable. It does not need to be padded to the right with '40'X up to a 128-byte length. Passwords less than 1 byte or greater than 128 bytes in length are not valid. The password will be 2 times its original length after conversion to UNICODE, so the maximum length of the variable that will hold the UNICODE password is 256 bytes.
contents.zh-CHS: 用户密码必须在128字节变量中左对齐。它不需要用“40”X（最多128字节）填充到右侧。长度小于1字节或大于128字节的密码无效。转换为UNICODE后，密码将是其原始长度的2倍，因此保存UNICODE密码的变量的最大长度为256字节。

contents.text: 3) Create a 20-byte password token as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 3) 创建一个20字节的密码令牌，如下所示：

contents.text:
PW_token = SHA-1(uppercase_unicode_userid,         /* 20 bytes */
                 unicode_password)      /* from 2 to 256 bytes */

The actual routine to be used to perform the SHA-1 processing is dependent on the programming language being used. For example, if using the Java language, then use the java.security class to perform the actual SHA-1 processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 用于执行SHA-1处理的实际例程取决于所使用的编程语言。例如，如果使用Java语言，则使用Java.security类执行实际的SHA-1处理。

contents.text: The PW_token will be used in subsequent step to actually generate the final substitute password.
contents.zh-CHS: PW_令牌将在后续步骤中用于实际生成最终替换密码。

contents.text: 4) Increment PWSEQs and store it.
contents.zh-CHS: 4) 增加PWSEQs并存储它。

contents.text: 5) Create the 20-byte substitute password as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 5) 创建20字节的替换密码，如下所示：

contents.text:
PW_SUB = SHA-1(PW_token,                        /* 20 bytes */
               serverseed,                      /*  8 bytes */
               clientseed,                      /*  8 bytes */
               uppercase_unicode_userid,        /* 20 bytes */
               PWSEQ)                           /*  8 bytes */

The actual routine to be used to perform the SHA-1 processing is dependent on the programming language being used. For example, if using the Java language, then use the java.security class to perform the actual SHA-1 processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 用于执行SHA-1处理的实际例程取决于所使用的编程语言。例如，如果使用Java语言，则使用Java.security类执行实际的SHA-1处理。

contents.text: 6) Example SHA Password Substitute Calculation
contents.zh-CHS: 6) 密码替换计算示例

contents.text: ID: USER123 Password: AbCdEfGh123?+ Server seed: '3E3A71C78795E5F5'X Client seed: 'B1C806D5D377D994'X PWSEQs: 1 (PWSEQs is a sequence number needed in the SHA encryption, and it is always one)
contents.zh-CHS: ID:USER123密码：AbCdEfGh123？+服务器种子：“3E3A71C78795E5F5'X客户端种子：'B1C806D5D377D994'X PWSEQs:1（PWSEQs是SHA加密中需要的序列号，并且始终为一）

contents.text: SHA Encrypted Password should be:
contents.zh-CHS: SHA加密密码应为：

contents.text: 'E7FAB5F034BEDA42E91F439DD07532A24140E3DD'X
contents.zh-CHS: 'E7FAB5F034BEDA42E91F439DD07532A24140E3DD'X'

contents.text: 6. Kerberos Services Ticket Automatic Sign-On Support
contents.zh-CHS: 6. Kerberos服务票证自动登录支持

contents.text: An iSeries Telnet server specific USERVAR defined below will contain the complete Generic Security Services (GSS) token for use on the iSeries. Enhanced Telnet clients will need to obtain the Kerberos services ticket from a Key Distribution Center (KDC). Implementation steps for acquiring the Kerberos services ticket will be limited to the Microsoft Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI) example below. For information on Kerberos services tickets, refer to your Network Authentication Service (NAS) documentation.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面定义的iSeries Telnet服务器特定用户变量将包含完整的通用安全服务（GSS）令牌，用于iSeries。增强型Telnet客户端需要从密钥分发中心（KDC）获取Kerberos服务票证。获取Kerberos服务票证的实现步骤将限于下面的Microsoft安全支持提供程序接口（SSPI）示例。有关Kerberos服务票证的信息，请参阅网络身份验证服务（NAS）文档。

contents.text: The custom USERVAR defined is:
contents.zh-CHS: 定义的自定义USERVAR是：

contents.text:
USERVAR   VALUE         EXAMPLE              DESCRIPTION
--------- ------------- -------------------- -------------------
IBMTICKET binary(16384) 16384-byte hex field Kerberos services token
Several other USERVARs, as defined in Section 6, can be used along with the IBMTICKET USERVAR to allow a user greater control over their startup environment.
contents.zh-CHS: 第6节中定义的其他几个USERVAR可以与IBMTICKET USERVAR一起使用，以允许用户更好地控制其启动环境。

contents.text: The custom USERVARs defined to accomplish this are:
contents.zh-CHS: 为实现此目的而定义的自定义用户变量包括：

contents.text:
USERVAR       VALUE              EXAMPLE            DESCRIPTION
--------      ----------------   ----------------   -----------------
IBMCURLIB     us-ascii char(x)   QGPL               Current library
IBMIMENU      us-ascii char(x)   MAIN               Initial menu
IBMPROGRAM    us-ascii char(x)   QCMD               Program to call
x - up to a maximum of 10 characters
contents.zh-CHS: x-最多10个字符

contents.text: If you use the IBMSENDCONFREC USERVAR, as described in Section 5, with a value of YES along with the Kerberos ticket USERVARs described above, you will receive a Startup Response Record that will contain a response code informing your Telnet client of the success or failure of the Kerberos validation attempt. See Section 11 for details on the Startup Response Record.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果使用IBMSENDCONFREC用户变量（如第5节所述），值为“是”的同时使用上述Kerberos票证用户变量，则将收到一条启动响应记录，其中包含一个响应代码，通知您的Telnet客户端Kerberos验证尝试的成功或失败。有关启动响应记录的详细信息，请参见第11节。

contents.text: The following Microsoft SSPI example illustrates how to get the client security token, which contains the Kerberos services ticket.
contents.zh-CHS: 下面的Microsoft SSPI示例说明了如何获取客户端安全令牌，该令牌包含Kerberos服务票证。

contents.text: 1) Get a handle to the user's credentials:
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 获取用户凭据的句柄：

contents.text:
ss = pSSPI_->AcquireCredentialsHandle(
             NULL,                 // Principal
             "Kerberos",           // PackageName
             SECPKG_CRED_OUTBOUND, // CredentialUse
             NULL,                 // LogonID
             NULL,                 // AuthData
             NULL,                 // GetKeyFnc
             NULL,                 // GetKeyArg
             &credHandle,          // CredHandle
             &timeStamp);          // ExpireTime
2) Initialize security context to "request delegation". Mutual authentication is also requested, although it is not required and may not be performed.
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 将安全上下文初始化为“请求委派”。也会请求相互身份验证，尽管这不是必需的，也可能不会执行。

contents.text:
pSSPI_->InitializeSecurityContext(
        &credHandle,               // CredHandle
        NULL,                      // Context
        "krbsrv400/fullyqualifiedLowerCaseSystemName",
                                   // ServicePrincipalName
        ISC_REQ_CONNECTION|ISC_REQ_DELEGATE|ISC_REQ_MUTUAL_AUTH,
                                   // ContextRequest
        NULL,                      // Reserved
        SECURITY_NATIVE_DREP,      // DataRep
        NULL,                      // Input
        NULL,                      // Reserved
        &newContext,               // NewContext
        &sbdo,                     // Output
        &contextAttr,              // ContextAttr
        &timeStamp);               // ExpireTime
3) Free the user credentials handle with FreeCredentialsHandle().
contents.zh-CHS: 3) 使用FreeCredentialsHandle（）释放用户凭据句柄。

contents.text: 4) Send security token to Telnet Server (padded with escape characters).
contents.zh-CHS: 4) 将安全令牌发送到Telnet服务器（用转义字符填充）。

contents.text: The following illustrates the Kerberos Token Negotiation:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下说明了Kerberos令牌协商：

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server            Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------       -------------------------------
IAC DO NEW-ENVIRON          -->
                            <--  IAC WILL NEW-ENVIRON
IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND
USERVAR "IBMRSEEDxxxxxxxx"
VAR USERVAR IAC SE          -->
                                 IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS
                                 USERVAR "IBMTICKET" VALUE
                                 "zzzzzzzz..."
                            <--  IAC SE
                             .
                             .
(other negotiations)         .

In this example, "xxxxxxxx" is an 8-byte hexadecimal random server seed, and "zzzzzzzz..." is the complete Kerberos services token. If the Kerberos services token is not valid, then the sign-on panel is not bypassed. It should be noted that for the Kerberos token a random server seed is not needed, although it will be sent by the Telnet Server.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本例中，“xxxxxxxx”是一个8字节的十六进制随机服务器种子，“zzzzzz…”是完整的Kerberos服务令牌。如果Kerberos服务令牌无效，则不会绕过登录面板。应该注意，对于Kerberos令牌，不需要随机服务器种子，尽管它将由Telnet服务器发送。

contents.text: Actual bytes transmitted in the above example are shown in hex below, where the server seed is "7D3E488F18080404", and the Kerberos services token starts with "DFB0402F22ABA3BA...". The complete Kerberos services token is not shown here, as the length of the token could be 16384 bytes and would make this document extremely large. As described in Section 6, the client must escape and/or byte stuff any Kerberos token bytes, which could be seen as a Telnet environment option [RFC1572], specifically VAR, VALUE, ESC, and USERVAR.
contents.zh-CHS: 上面示例中传输的实际字节如下所示，其中服务器种子为“7D3E488F18080404”，Kerberos服务令牌以“DFB0402F22F2ABA3BA…”开头。这里没有显示完整的Kerberos服务令牌，因为令牌的长度可能是16384字节，这将使此文档非常大。如第6节所述，客户机必须转义和/或字节填充任何Kerberos令牌字节，这可以被视为Telnet环境选项[RFC1572]，特别是VAR、VALUE、ESC和USERVAR。

contents.text: 7. Device Name Collision Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 设备名称冲突处理

contents.text: Device name collision occurs when a Telnet client sends the Telnet server a virtual device name that it wants to use, but that device is already in use on the server. When this occurs, the Telnet server sends a request to the client asking it to try another device name. The environment option negotiation uses the USERVAR name of DEVNAME to communicate the virtual device name. The following shows how the Telnet server will request the Telnet client to send a different DEVNAME when device name collision occurs.
contents.zh-CHS: 当Telnet客户端向Telnet服务器发送它想要使用的虚拟设备名，但该设备已在服务器上使用时，就会发生设备名冲突。发生这种情况时，Telnet服务器会向客户端发送一个请求，要求它尝试另一个设备名。环境选项协商使用DEVNAME的USERVAR名称来传递虚拟设备名称。下面显示了当发生设备名称冲突时，Telnet服务器将如何请求Telnet客户端发送不同的DEVNAME。

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server            Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------       -------------------------
IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND
VAR USERVAR IAC SE         -->
Server requests all environment variables be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器请求发送所有环境变量。

contents.text: IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS USERVAR "DEVNAME" VALUE "MYDEVICE1" USERVAR "xxxxx" VALUE "xxx" ... <-- IAC SE
contents.zh-CHS: IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON是用户变量“DEVNAME”值“MYDEVICE1”用户变量“xxxxx”值“xxx”…<--IAC SE

contents.text: Client sends all environment variables, including DEVNAME. Server tries to select device MYDEVICE1. If the device is already in use, server requests DEVNAME be sent again.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端发送所有环境变量，包括DEVNAME。服务器尝试选择设备MYDEVICE1。如果设备已在使用中，服务器将再次发送DEVNAME请求。

contents.text: IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND USERVAR "DEVNAME" IAC SE -->
contents.zh-CHS: IAC SB新环境发送用户变量“DEVNAME”IAC SE-->

contents.text: Server sends a request for a single environment variable: DEVNAME
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器发送对单个环境变量的请求：DEVNAME

contents.text: IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS USERVAR <-- "DEVNAME" VALUE "MYDEVICE2" IAC SE
contents.zh-CHS: IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON是USERVAR<--“DEVNAME”值“MYDEVICE2”IAC SE

contents.text: Client sends one environment variable, calculating a new value of MYDEVICE2. If MYDEVICE2 is different from the last request, then server tries to select device MYDEVICE2, else server disconnects client. If MYDEVICE2 is also in use, server will send DEVNAME request again and keep doing so until it receives a device that is not in use, or the same device name twice in row.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端发送一个环境变量，计算MYDEVICE2的新值。如果MYDEVICE2与上次请求不同，则服务器将尝试选择设备MYDEVICE2，否则服务器将断开与客户端的连接。若MYDEVICE2也在使用中，服务器将再次发送DEVNAME请求，并继续发送，直到它接收到一个未使用的设备，或者第二行接收到相同的设备名。

contents.text: 8. Enhanced Printer Emulation Support
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 增强的打印机仿真支持

contents.text: Telnet environment option USERVARs have been defined to allow a compliant Telnet client more control over the Telnet server virtual device on the iSeries. These USERVARs allow the client Telnet to select a previously created virtual device or auto-create a new virtual device with requested attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: Telnet环境选项USERVARs已定义为允许兼容的Telnet客户端对iSeries上的Telnet服务器虚拟设备进行更多控制。这些用户变量允许客户端Telnet选择以前创建的虚拟设备，或使用请求的属性自动创建新的虚拟设备。

contents.text: This makes the enhancements available to any Telnet client that chooses to support the new negotiations.
contents.zh-CHS: 这使得选择支持新谈判的任何Telnet客户端都可以使用这些增强功能。

contents.text: The USERVARs defined to accomplish this are:
contents.zh-CHS: 为实现这一点而定义的用户变量包括：

contents.text:
USERVAR       VALUE            EXAMPLE           DESCRIPTION
------------- ---------------- ----------------  -------------------
DEVNAME       us-ascii char(x) PRINTER1          Printer device name
IBMIGCFEAT    us-ascii char(6) 2424J0            IGC feature (DBCS)
IBMMSGQNAME   us-ascii char(x) QSYSOPR           *MSGQ name
IBMMSGQLIB    us-ascii char(x) QSYS              *MSGQ library
IBMFONT       us-ascii char(x) 12                Font
IBMFORMFEED   us-ascii char(1) C | U | A         Formfeed
IBMTRANSFORM  us-ascii char(1) 1 | 0             Transform
IBMMFRTYPMDL  us-ascii char(x) *IBM42023         Mfg. type and model
IBMPPRSRC1    binary(1)        1-byte hex field  Paper source 1
IBMPPRSRC2    binary(1)        1-byte hex field  Paper source 2
IBMENVELOPE   binary(1)        1-byte hex field  Envelope hopper
IBMASCII899   us-ascii char(1) 1 | 0             ASCII 899 support
IBMWSCSTNAME  us-ascii char(x) *NONE             WSCST name
IBMWSCSTLIB   us-ascii char(x) *LIBL             WSCST library
x - up to a maximum of 10 characters
contents.zh-CHS: x-最多10个字符

contents.text: The "IBM" prefix on the USERVARs denotes iSeries-specific attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: USERVARs上的“IBM”前缀表示iSeries特定的属性。

contents.text: The DEVNAME USERVAR is used for both displays and printers. The IBMFONT and IBMASCII899 are used only for SBCS environments.
contents.zh-CHS: DEVNAME USERVAR用于显示器和打印机。IBMFONT和IBMASCII899仅用于SBCS环境。

contents.text: For a description of most of these parameters (drop the "IBM" from the USERVAR) and their permissible values, refer to Chapter 8 in the Communications Configuration Reference [COMM-CONFIG].
contents.zh-CHS: 有关大多数参数（从USERVAR中删除“IBM”）及其允许值的说明，请参阅通信配置参考[COMM-CONFIG]中的第8章。

contents.text: The IBMIGCFEAT supports the following variable DBCS language identifiers in position 5 (positions 1-4 must be '2424'; position 6 must be '0'):
contents.zh-CHS: IBMIGCFEAT在位置5支持以下变量DBCS语言标识符（位置1-4必须为“2424”；位置6必须为“0”）：

contents.text:
'J' = Japanese              'K' = Korean
'C' = Traditional Chinese   'S' = Simplified Chinese
The IBMTRANSFORM and IBMASCII899 values correspond to:
contents.zh-CHS: IBMTRANSFORM和IBMASCII899值对应于：

contents.text: The IBMFORMFEED values correspond to:
contents.zh-CHS: IBMFORMFEED值对应于：

contents.text: 'C' = Continuous  'U' = Cut  'A' = Autocut

The IBMPPRSRC1, IBMPPRSRC2, and IBMENVELOPE custom USERVARs do not map directly to their descriptions in Chapter 8 in the Communications Configuration Reference [COMM-CONFIG]. To map these, use the index listed here:
contents.zh-CHS: IBMPPRSRC1、IBMPPRSRC2和ibmendevelope自定义用户变量不直接映射到通信配置参考[COMM-CONFIG]第8章中的描述。要映射这些，请使用此处列出的索引：

contents.text:
IBMPPRSRC1    HEX     IBMPPRSRC2    HEX     IBMENVELOPE    HEX
----------   -----    ----------   -----    -----------   -----
*NONE        'FF'X    *NONE        'FF'X    *NONE         'FF'X
*MFRTYPMDL   '00'X    *MFRTYPMDL   '00'X    *MFRTYPMDL    '00'X
*LETTER      '01'X    *LETTER      '01'X    *B5           '06'X
*LEGAL       '02'X    *LEGAL       '02'X    *MONARCH      '09'X
*EXECUTIVE   '03'X    *EXECUTIVE   '03'X    *NUMBER9      '0A'X
*A4          '04'X    *A4          '04'X    *NUMBER10     '0B'X
*A5          '05'X    *A5          '05'X    *C5           '0C'X
*B5          '06'X    *B5          '06'X    *DL           '0D'X
*CONT80      '07'X    *CONT80      '07'X
*CONT132     '08'X    *CONT132     '08'X
*A3          '0E'X    *A3          '0E'X
*B4          '0F'X    *B4          '0F'X
*LEDGER      '10'X    *LEDGER      '10'X
9. Telnet Printer Terminal Types
contents.zh-CHS: 9. Telnet打印机终端类型

contents.text: New Telnet options are defined for the printer pass-through mode of operation. To enable printer pass-through mode, both the client and server must agree to support at least the Transmit-Binary, End-Of-Record, and Terminal-Type Telnet options. The following are new terminal types for printers:
contents.zh-CHS: 为打印机直通操作模式定义了新的Telnet选项。要启用打印机直通模式，客户端和服务器必须同意至少支持传输二进制、记录结束和终端类型Telnet选项。以下是打印机的新终端类型：

contents.text:
TERMINAL-TYPE  DESCRIPTION
-------------  -------------------
IBM-5553-B01   Double-Byte printer
IBM-3812-1     Single-Byte printer
Specific characteristics of the IBM-5553-B01 or IBM-3812-1 printers are specified through the USERVAR IBMMFRTYPMDL, which specifies the manufacturer type and model.
contents.zh-CHS: IBM-5553-B01或IBM-3812-1打印机的特定特性通过USERVAR IBMMFRTYPMDL指定，该文件指定了制造商类型和型号。

contents.text: An example of a typical negotiation process to establish printer pass-through mode of operation is shown below. In this example, the server initiates the negotiation by sending the DO TERMINAL-TYPE request.
contents.zh-CHS: 建立打印机直通操作模式的典型协商过程示例如下所示。在本例中，服务器通过发送DO终端类型请求来启动协商。

contents.text: For DBCS environments, if IBMTRANSFORM is set to 1 (use Host Print Transform), then the virtual device created is 3812, not 5553. Therefore, IBM-3812-1 (and not IBM-5553-B01) should be negotiated for TERMINAL-TYPE.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于DBCS环境，如果IBMTRANSFORM设置为1（使用主机打印转换），则创建的虚拟设备为3812，而不是5553。因此，应就终端类型协商IBM-3812-1（而不是IBM-5553-B01）。

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server           Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------      --------------------------
IAC DO NEW-ENVIRON         -->
                           <--  IAC WILL NEW-ENVIRON
IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND
VAR USERVAR IAC SE         -->
                                IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS
                                USERVAR "DEVNAME" VALUE "PCPRINTER"
                                USERVAR "IBMMSGQNAME" VALUE "QSYSOPR"
                                USERVAR "IBMMSGQLIB" VALUE "*LIBL"
                                USERVAR "IBMTRANSFORM" VALUE "0"
                                USERVAR "IBMFONT" VALUE "12"
                                USERVAR "IBMFORMFEED" VALUE "C"
                                USERVAR "IBMPPRSRC1" VALUE ESC '01'X
                                USERVAR "IBMPPRSRC2" VALUE '04'X
                                USERVAR "IBMENVELOPE" VALUE IAC 'FF'X
<-- IAC SE IAC DO TERMINAL-TYPE --> <-- IAC WILL TERMINAL-TYPE IAC SB TERMINAL-TYPE SEND
contents.zh-CHS: <--IAC SE IAC DO终端类型--><--IAC将终端类型IAC SB终端类型发送

contents.text:
IAC SE                     -->
                                IAC SB TERMINAL-TYPE IS IBM-3812-1
                           <--  IAC SE
IAC DO BINARY              -->
                           <--  IAC WILL BINARY
IAC DO EOR                 -->
                           <--  IAC WILL EOR

Some points about the above example. The IBMPPRSRC1 value requires escaping the value using ESC according to Telnet environment options [RFC1572]. The IBMPPRSRC2 does not require an ESC character since '04'X has no conflict with environment options. Finally, to send 'FF'X for the IBMENVELOPE value, escape the 'FF'X value by using another 'FF'X (called "doubling"), so as not to have the value interpreted as a Telnet character per the Telnet protocol specification [RFC854].
contents.zh-CHS: 关于上述示例的一些要点。IBMPPRSRC1值需要根据Telnet环境选项[RFC1572]使用ESC转义该值。IBMPPRSRC2不需要ESC字符，因为'04'X与环境选项没有冲突。最后，要为ibmendevelope值发送'FF'X，请使用另一个'FF'X（称为“加倍”）对'FF'X值进行转义，以便根据Telnet协议规范[RFC854]将该值解释为Telnet字符。

contents.text: Actual bytes transmitted in the above example are shown in hex below.
contents.zh-CHS: 在上述示例中传输的实际字节以十六进制表示。

contents.text: 10. Startup Response Record for Printer and Display Devices
contents.zh-CHS: 10. 打印机和显示设备的启动响应记录

contents.text: Once Telnet negotiation for a 5250 pass-through mode is completed, the iSeries Telnet server will initiate a virtual device (printer or display) power-on sequence on behalf of the Telnet client. The Telnet server will supply a Startup Response Record to the Telnet client with the status of the device power-on sequence, indicating success or failure of the virtual device power-on sequence.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦5250直通模式的Telnet协商完成，iSeries Telnet服务器将代表Telnet客户端启动虚拟设备（打印机或显示器）通电顺序。Telnet服务器将向Telnet客户端提供一个启动响应记录，记录设备通电顺序的状态，指示虚拟设备通电顺序的成功或失败。

contents.text: This section shows an example of two Startup Response Records. The source device is a type 3812 model 01 printer with the name "PCPRINTER" on the target system "TARGET".
contents.zh-CHS: 本节显示了两个启动响应记录的示例。源设备是目标系统“target”上名为“PCPRINTER”的3812型01打印机。

contents.text: Figure 1 shows an example of a successful response; Figure 2 shows an example of an error response.
contents.zh-CHS: 图1显示了一个成功响应的示例；图2显示了一个错误响应的示例。

contents.text: 10.1. Example of a Success Response Record
contents.zh-CHS: 10.1. 成功响应记录的示例

contents.text: The response record in Figure 1 was sent by an iSeries at Release V4R2. It is an example of the target sending back a successful Startup Response Record.
contents.zh-CHS: 图1中的响应记录是由iSeries在V4R2版本发送的。这是目标发送回成功启动响应记录的示例。

contents.text: Figure 1. Example of a success response record
contents.zh-CHS: 图1。成功响应记录的示例

contents.text: - '0049'X = Length pass-through data, including this length field - '12A0'X = GDS LU6.2 header - '90000560060020C0003D0000'X = Fixed value fields - 'C9F9F0F2'X = Response Code (I902) - 'E3C1D9C7C5E34040'X = System Name (TARGET) - 'D7C3D7D9C9D5E3C5D940'X = Object Name (PCPRINTER)
contents.zh-CHS: - “0049”X=长度传递数据，包括此长度字段-“12A0”X=GDS LU6.2标头-“90000560020C0003D0000”X=固定值字段-“C9F9F0F2”X=响应代码（I902）-“E3C1D9C7C5E34040”X=系统名称（目标）-“D7C3D7D9C9D5E3C5D940”X=对象名称（PCPRINTER）

contents.zh-CHS: 10.2. 错误响应记录的示例

contents.text: The response record in Figure 2 is one that reports an error. The virtual device named "PCPRINTER" is not available on the target system "TARGET" because the device is not available. You would normally see this error if the printer were already assigned to another Telnet session.
contents.zh-CHS: 图2中的响应记录报告了一个错误。名为“PCPRINTER”的虚拟设备在目标系统“target”上不可用，因为该设备不可用。如果打印机已分配给另一个Telnet会话，则通常会看到此错误。

contents.zh-CHS: 图2。错误响应记录的示例

contents.text: 10.3. Example of a Response Record with Device Name Retry
contents.zh-CHS: 10.3. 设备名为“重试”的响应记录示例

contents.text: The Response Record can be used in conjunction with the DEVNAME Environment variable to allow client emulators to inform users of connection failures. In addition, this combination could be used by client emulators that accept multiple device names to try on session connections. The client would be able to walk through a list of possible device names and provide feedback based on the response code(s) received for each device name that was rejected.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应记录可以与DEVNAME环境变量结合使用，以允许客户端模拟器通知用户连接失败。此外，接受多个设备名称的客户端仿真器可以使用这种组合来尝试会话连接。客户机将能够浏览可能的设备名称列表，并根据为每个被拒绝的设备名称接收的响应代码提供反馈。

contents.text: The following sequence shows a negotiation between the client and the server in which a named device "RFCTEST" is requested by the client. The device name is already assigned to an existing condition. The server responds with the Response Record showing an 8902 response code. The client could use this information to inform the user that the device name just tried was already in use. Following the Response Record the server would then invite the client to try another device name. Because the same device name was used again by the client, the server closed the session.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下序列显示了客户端和服务器之间的协商，其中客户端请求命名设备“RFCTEST”。设备名称已分配给现有条件。服务器用显示8902响应代码的响应记录进行响应。客户端可以使用此信息通知用户刚才尝试的设备名称已在使用中。在响应记录之后，服务器将邀请客户端尝试另一个设备名称。由于客户端再次使用了相同的设备名，服务器关闭了会话。

contents.text:
iSeries Telnet server            Enhanced Telnet client
--------------------------       -------------------------
IAC DO NEW-ENVIRON          -->
                            <--   IAC WILL NEW-ENVIRON
IAC DO TERMINAL-TYPE        -->
                            <--   IAC WILL TERMINAL-TYPE
IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND
USERVAR "IBMRSEEDxxxxxxxx"
VAR USERVAR IAC SE          -->
                                  IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS
                                  USERVAR "DEVNAME"
                                  VALUE "RFCTEST"
                                  USERVAR "IBMSENDCONFREC"
                                  VALUE "YES"
                            <--   IAC SE
IAC SB TERMINAL-TYPE SEND
IAC SE                      -->
                                  IAC SB TERMINAL-TYPE IS
                            <--   IBM-3180-2 IAC SE
                                  (terminal type negotiations
                                  completed)
IAC DO EOR                  -->
                            <--   IAC WILL EOR
IAC WILL EOR                -->
                            <--   IAC DO EOR
IAC DO BINARY               -->
                            <--   IAC WILL BINARY
IAC WILL BINARY             -->
                            <--   IAC DO BINARY
(73 BYTE RFC 1205 RECORD
WITH 8902 ERROR CODE)       -->
IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND
USERVAR "DEVNAME"
IAC SE                      -->
                                  IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON IS
                                  USERVAR "DEVNAME"
                                  VALUE "RFCTEST"
                                  USERVAR "IBMSENDCONFREC"
                                  VALUE "YES"
                            <--   IAC SE
(server closes connection)
Actual bytes transmitted in the above example are shown in hex below.
contents.zh-CHS: 在上述示例中传输的实际字节以十六进制表示。

contents.text: 10.4. Response Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 10.4. 响应代码

The Start-Up Response Record error response codes for non-Kerberos Services Token automatic sign-on:

The Start-Up Response Record error response codes for Kerberos Services Token automatic sign-on support:

CODE    DESCRIPTION
----    ------------------------------------------------------

In the case where the USERVAR, DEVNAME USERVAR, IBMSENDCONFREC USERVAR, IBMSUBSPW USERVAR, and IBMRSEED USERVAR are all used together, any device errors will take precedence over automatic sign-on errors. That is:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果同时使用USERVAR、DEVNAME USERVAR、IBMSENDCONFREC USERVAR、IBMSUBSPW USERVAR和IBMRSEED USERVAR，则任何设备错误都将优先于自动登录错误。即:

contents.text: 1) If the requested named device is not available or an error occurs when attempting to create the device on the server system, a device related return code (i.e., 8902) will be sent to the client system in the display confirmation record.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 如果请求的命名设备不可用，或者尝试在服务器系统上创建设备时发生错误，将在显示确认记录中向客户端系统发送与设备相关的返回代码（即8902）。

contents.text: 2) If the requested named device is available or no errors occur when attempting to create the device on the server system, an automatic sign-on return code (i.e., 0002) will be sent to the client system in the display confirmation record.
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 如果请求的命名设备可用，或者尝试在服务器系统上创建设备时未发生错误，则会在显示确认记录中将自动登录返回代码（即0002）发送到客户端系统。

contents.text: 11. Printer Steady-State Pass-Through Interface
contents.zh-CHS: 11. 打印机稳态通过接口

contents.text: The information in this section applies to the pass-through session after the receipt of startup confirmation records is complete.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节中的信息适用于收到启动确认记录后的直通会话。

contents.text: Following is the printer header interface used by Telnet.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是Telnet使用的打印机标题界面。

contents.text: Figure 3. Layout of the printer pass-through header
contents.zh-CHS: 图3。打印机直通标题的布局

contents.text: BYTES 0-1: Length of structure including this field (LLLL)
contents.zh-CHS: 字节0-1：包含此字段的结构长度（LLLL）

contents.text: BYTES 2-3: GDS Identifier ('12A0'X)
contents.zh-CHS: 字节2-3:GDS标识符（'12A0'X）

contents.text: BYTE 4-5: Data flow record
contents.zh-CHS: 字节4-5：数据流记录

contents.text: This field contains flags that describe what type of data pass-through should be expected to be found following this header. Generally, bits 0-2 in the first byte are mutually exclusive (that is, if one of them is
contents.zh-CHS: 此字段包含标志，这些标志描述了在此标头之后应该找到的数据传递类型。通常，第一个字节中的位0-2是互斥的（即，如果其中一个是互斥的）

contents.text: set to '1'B, the rest will be set to '0'B.) The bits and their meanings follow.
contents.zh-CHS: 设置为“1”B，其余将设置为“0”B。）位及其含义如下。

contents.text: BIT DESCRIPTION
contents.zh-CHS: 位描述

contents.text: 0 Start-Up confirmation 1 Termination record 2 Start-Up Record 3 Diagnostic information included 4 - 5 Reserved 6 Reserved 7 Printer record 8 - 13 Reserved 14 Client-originated (inbound) printer record 15 Server-originated (outbound) printer record
contents.zh-CHS: 0启动确认1终止记录2启动记录3诊断信息包括4-5保留6保留7打印机记录8-13保留14客户端起源（入站）打印机记录15服务器起源（出站）打印机记录

contents.text: BYTE 6: Length printer pass-through header including this field (LL)
contents.zh-CHS: 字节6：包含此字段的打印机通过页眉长度（LL）

contents.text: BYTES 7-8: Flags
contents.zh-CHS: 字节7-8：标志

contents.text:
BYTE 7 BITS:  xxxx x111 --> Reserved
              xxxx 1xxx --> Last of chain
              xxx1 xxxx --> First of chain
              xx1x xxxx --> Printer now ready
              x1xx xxxx --> Intervention Required
              1xxx xxxx --> Error Indicator
BYTE 8 BITS:  xxxx xxxx --> Reserved
BYTE 9: Printer operation code
contents.zh-CHS: 字节9：打印机操作代码

contents.text: '01'X Print/Print complete '02'X Clear Print Buffers
contents.zh-CHS: '01'X打印/打印完成'02'X清除打印缓冲区

contents.text: BYTE 10-LL: Diagnostic information (Note 1)
contents.zh-CHS: 诊断信息（注：1字节）

contents.text: If BYTE 7 = xx1x xxxx, then bytes 10-LL may contain: Printer ready C9 00 00 00 02
contents.zh-CHS: 如果字节7=xx1x xxxx，则字节10-LL可能包含：打印机就绪C9 00 02

contents.text: If BYTE 7 = x1xx xxxx, then bytes 10-LL may contain: (Note 2) Command/parameter not valid C9 00 03 02 2x Print check C9 00 03 02 3x Forms check C9 00 03 02 4x Normal periodic condition C9 00 03 02 5x Data stream error C9 00 03 02 6x Machine/print/ribbon check C9 00 03 02 8x
contents.zh-CHS: 如果字节7=x1xx xxxx，则字节10-LL可能包含：（注2）命令/参数无效C9 00 03 02 2x打印检查C9 00 03 02 3x表格检查C9 00 03 02 4x正常周期条件C9 00 03 02 5x数据流错误C9 00 03 02 6x机器/打印/功能区检查C9 00 03 02 8x

contents.text: If BYTE 7 = 1xxx xxxx, then bytes 10-LL may contain: (Note 3) Cancel 08 11 02 00 Invalid print parameter 08 11 02 29 Invalid print command 08 11 02 28
contents.zh-CHS: 如果字节7=1xxx xxxx，则字节10-LL可能包含：（注3）取消08 11 02 00无效打印参数08 11 02 29无效打印命令08 11 02 28

contents.text: Diagnostic information notes:
contents.zh-CHS: 诊断信息注释：

contents.text: 1. LL is the length of the structure defined in Byte 6. If no additional data is present, the remainder of the structure must be padded with zeroes.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. LL是字节6中定义的结构的长度。如果没有其他数据，则必须用零填充结构的其余部分。

contents.text: 2. These are printer SIGNAL commands. Further information on these commands may be obtained from the 5494 Remote Control Unit Functions Reference guide [5494-CU]. Refer to your iSeries printer documentation for more specific information on these data stream exceptions. The following are some 3812 and 5553 errors that may be seen:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 这些是打印机信号命令。有关这些命令的更多信息，请参阅《5494远程控制单元功能参考指南》[5494-CU]。有关这些数据流异常的详细信息，请参阅iSeries打印机文档。以下是可能出现的3812和5553错误：

contents.text: Machine check C9 00 03 02 11 Graphics check C9 00 03 02 26 Print check C9 00 03 02 31 Form jam C9 00 03 02 41 Paper jam C9 00 03 02 47 End of forms C9 00 03 02 50 Printer not ready C9 00 03 02 51 Data stream - class 1 C9 00 03 02 66 loss of text Data stream - class 2 C9 00 03 02 67 text appearance Data stream - class 3 C9 00 03 02 68 multibyte control error Data stream - class 4 C9 00 03 02 69 multibyte control parm Cover unexpectedly open C9 00 03 02 81 Machine check C9 00 03 02 86 Machine check C9 00 03 02 87 Ribbon check C9 00 03 02 88
contents.zh-CHS: 机器检查C9 00 03 02 11图形检查C9 00 03 02 26打印检查C9 00 03 02 31表格堵塞C9 00 03 02 41卡纸C9 00 03 02 47表格结束C9 00 03 02 50打印机未就绪C9 00 03 02 51数据流-类别1 C9 00 03 02 66文本数据流丢失-类别2 C9 00 03 02 67文本外观数据流-类别3 C9 00 02 68多字节控制错误数据流-4级C9 00 03 02 69多字节控制参数盖意外打开C9 00 03 02 81机器检查C9 00 03 02 86机器检查C9 00 03 02 87功能区检查C9 00 03 02 88

contents.text: 3. These are printer negative responses. Further information on these commands may be obtained from the 5494 Remote Control Unit Functions Reference guide [5494-CU].
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 这些都是否定的回答。有关这些命令的更多信息，请参阅《5494远程控制单元功能参考指南》[5494-CU]。

contents.text: The print data will start in byte LL+1.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印数据将从字节LL+1开始。

contents.text: 11.1. Example of a Print Record
contents.zh-CHS: 11.1. 打印记录的示例

contents.text: Figure 4 shows the server sending the client data with a print record. This is normally seen following receipt of a Success Response Record, such as the example in Figure 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 图4显示了服务器发送带有打印记录的客户端数据。这通常在收到成功响应记录后出现，如图1中的示例。

contents.text: Figure 4. Server sending client data with a print record
contents.zh-CHS: 图4。服务器发送带有打印记录的客户端数据

contents.text:
- '0085'X         = Logical record length, including this byte (LLLL)
- '12A0'X         = GDS LU6.2 header
- '0101'X         = Data flow record (server to client)
- '0A'X           = Length of pass-through specific header (LL)
- '1800'X         = First of chain / Last of chain indicators
- '01'X           = Print
- '000000000000'X = Zero pad header to LL specified

- Remainder is printer data/commands/orders
11.2. Example of a Print Complete Record
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2. 打印完整记录的示例

contents.text: Figure 5 shows the client sending the server a print complete record. This would normally follow receipt of a print record, such as the example in Figure 4. This indicates successful completion of a print request.
contents.zh-CHS: 图5显示了向服务器发送打印完整记录的客户端。这通常是在收到打印记录之后进行的，如图4中的示例。这表示打印请求已成功完成。

contents.text: Figure 5. Client sending server a print complete record
contents.zh-CHS: 图5。客户端向服务器发送打印完整记录

contents.text: - '000A'X = Logical record length, including this byte (LLLL) - '12A0'X = GDS LU6.2 header - '0102'X = Data flow response record (client to server) - '04'X = Length of pass-through specific header (LL) - '0000'X = Good Response - '01'X = Print Complete
contents.zh-CHS: - '000A'X=逻辑记录长度，包括此字节（LLLL）-'12A0'X=GDS LU6.2标头-'0102'X=数据流响应记录（客户端到服务器）-'04'X=通过特定标头的长度（LL）-'0000'X=良好响应-'01'X=打印完成

contents.text: 11.3. Example of a Null Print Record
contents.zh-CHS: 11.3. 空打印记录的示例

contents.text: Figure 6 shows the server sending the client a null print record. The null print record is the last print command the server sends to the client for a print job, and it indicates to the printer that there is no more data. The null data byte '00'X is optional and in some cases may be omitted (in particular, this scenario occurs in DBCS print streams).
contents.zh-CHS: 图6显示了服务器向客户端发送空打印记录。空打印记录是服务器为打印作业发送给客户端的最后一个打印命令，它向打印机指示没有更多数据。空数据字节'00'X是可选的，在某些情况下可以省略（特别是，这种情况发生在DBCS打印流中）。

contents.text: This example would normally follow any number of print records, such as the example in Figure 4. This indicates successful completion of a print job. The client normally responds to this null print record with another print complete record, such as in Figure 5.
contents.zh-CHS: 此示例通常会遵循任意数量的打印记录，如图4中的示例。这表示打印作业已成功完成。客户机通常使用另一个完整的打印记录来响应这个空打印记录，如图5所示。

contents.text: Figure 6. Server sending client a null print record
contents.zh-CHS: 图6。服务器正在向客户端发送空打印记录

contents.zh-CHS: - '0011'X=逻辑记录长度，包括此字节-'12A0'X=GDS LU6.2标头-'0101'X=数据流记录-'0A'X=通过特定标头的长度（LL）-'0800'X=链的最后一个-'01'X=打印-'000000000000'X=零填充标头到LL指定-'00'X=空数据字节

contents.text: 12. End-to-End Print Example
contents.zh-CHS: 12. 端到端打印示例

contents.text: The next example shows a full print exchange between a Telnet client and server for a 526 byte spooled file. Selective translation of the hexadecimal streams into 1) Telnet negotiations and 2) ASCII/EBCDIC characters is done to aid readability. Telnet negotiations are delimited by '(' and ')' parenthesis characters; ASCII/EBCDIC conversions are bracketed by '|' vertical bar characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 下一个示例显示了Telnet客户端和服务器之间对526字节假脱机文件的完整打印交换。有选择地将十六进制数据流翻译成1）Telnet协商和2）ASCII/EBCDIC字符，以提高可读性。Telnet协商由“（”和“）”括号字符分隔；ASCII/EBCDIC转换用“|”竖线字符括起来。

contents.text: (IAC DO NEW-ENVIRON) <-- FFFB27
contents.zh-CHS: （IAC DO NEW-ENVIRON）<--FFFB27

contents.text: (IAC WILL NEW-ENVIRON)
contents.zh-CHS: （IAC将与新环境合作）

contents.text: (IAC DO TERMINAL-TYPE IAC SB NEW-ENVIRON SEND USERVAR IBMRSEED xxxxxxxx VAR USERVAR IAC SE)
contents.zh-CHS: （IAC DO终端类型IAC SB NEW-ENVIRO发送用户变量IBMRSEED xxxxxxxx用户变量IAC SE）

contents.text: <-- FFFB18
contents.zh-CHS: <--FFFB18

contents.text: (IAC WILL TERMINAL-TYPE)

contents.text: 13. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 安全考虑

contents.text: The auto-sign-on feature provided by this RFC describes a way to encrypt your login password. However, while passwords can now be encrypted by using the IBMRSEED and IBMSUBSPW USERVAR negotiations, users should understand that only the login passwords are encrypted and not the entire Telnet session. Encryption of the Telnet session requires that another protocol layer, such as SSL, be added.
contents.zh-CHS: 此RFC提供的自动登录功能描述了一种加密登录密码的方法。然而，虽然现在可以通过使用IBMRSEED和IBMSUBSPW USERVAR协商对密码进行加密，但用户应该了解，只有登录密码是加密的，而不是整个Telnet会话。Telnet会话的加密需要添加另一个协议层，如SSL。

contents.text: The auto-sign-on feature supports plain text passwords, encrypted passwords, and Kerberos tokens. However, using plain text passwords is strongly discouraged. iSeries system administrators may want to configure their systems to reject plain text passwords.
contents.zh-CHS: 自动登录功能支持纯文本密码、加密密码和Kerberos令牌。但是，强烈建议不要使用纯文本密码。iSeries系统管理员可能希望将其系统配置为拒绝纯文本密码。

contents.text: 14. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 14. IANA考虑

contents.text: IANA registered the terminal types "IBM-3812-1" and "IBM-5553-B01" as a terminal type [RFC1091]. They are used when communicating with iSeries Telnet servers.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA将终端类型“IBM-3812-1”和“IBM-5553-B01”注册为终端类型[RFC1091]。它们在与iSeries Telnet服务器通信时使用。

contents.text: 17. Relation to Other RFCs
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 与其他RFC的关系

contents.text: This RFC relies on the 5250 Telnet Interface [RFC1205] in all examples.
contents.zh-CHS: 在所有示例中，此RFC都依赖于5250 Telnet接口[RFC1205]。

contents.text: This RFC replaces 5250 Telnet Enhancements [RFC2877], adding new sections for Kerberos, SHA-1, security and IANA considerations. Minor corrections and additional examples were also added.
contents.zh-CHS: 此RFC取代了5250 Telnet增强功能[RFC2877]，为Kerberos、SHA-1、安全性和IANA注意事项添加了新的部分。还添加了一些小的更正和其他示例。
